verses.verse: For <S%G1657>freedom<s%> <S%G3739>did<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1659>set<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1657>free<s%>: stand <S%G4739>fast<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1758>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1758>entangled<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> in a <S%G2218>yoke<s%> of <S%G1397>bondage<s%>.

Behold <S%G1492><s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> ye receive <S%G4059>circumcision<s%>, <S%G5547>Christ<s%> will <S%G5623>profit<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

Yea <S%G1161><s%>, I <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that receiveth <S%G4059>circumcision<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3781>debtor<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3551>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>.

Ye are <S%G2673>severed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2673>ye<s%> who <S%G3748>would<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>; ye are fallen away <S%G1601>from<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> through the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> wait <S%G553>for<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G2480>availeth<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1754>working<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>.
Ye were <S%G5143>running<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%>; <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G348>hindered<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> that ye <S%G3982>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> the <S%G1465>truth<s%>?
This <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3988>persuasion<s%> came <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> him <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2564>calleth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.
A <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> <S%G2220>leaveneth<s%> <S%G5445>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5445>lump<s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you-ward<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> ye will <S%G5426>be<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G243>otherwise<s%> <S%G5426>minded<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5015>troubleth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> shall <S%G941>bear<s%> <S%G3588>his<s%> <S%G3748>judgment<s%>, <S%G302>whosoever<s%> he <S%G5600>be<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2784>I<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> am <S%G1377>I<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted<s%>? <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G2673>hath<s%> the <S%G4625>stumbling-block<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> been done <S%G2673>away<s%>.
I <S%G3785>would<s%> that they <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G387>unsettle<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G609>would<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> go beyond <S%G609>circumcision<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, were <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G1657>freedom<s%>; <S%G3440>only<s%> use <S%G3361>not<s%> your <S%G1657>freedom<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> an <S%G874>occasion<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G1398>servants<s%> one to <S%G240>another<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, even <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%>: Thou shalt <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>thyself<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G1143>bite<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>, take <S%G991>heed<s%> that ye <S%G355>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G355>consumed<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>.

But I <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G5055>shall<s%> not3756, 3361 <S%G5055>fulfil<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1937>lusteth<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>; <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> are <S%G480>contrary<s%> the one to the <S%G240>other<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4160>ye<s%> may <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G5023>things<s%> that3739, Leviticus2 ye <S%G2309>would<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye are <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3430>these<s%>: <S%G4202>fornication<s%>, <S%G167>uncleanness<s%>, <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%>,

idolatry <S%G1495><s%>, <S%G5331>sorcery<s%>, <S%G2189>enmities<s%>, <S%G2052>strife<s%>, <S%G2205>jealousies<s%>, <S%G2372>wraths<s%>, <S%G2052>factions<s%>, <S%G1370>divisions<s%>, <S%G139>parties<s%>,

envyings <S%G5355><s%>, <S%G5408><s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness<s%>, <S%G2970>revellings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5125>such<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%>; of <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G4302>forewarn<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G4302>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> I did4277, 2532 <S%G4277>forewarn<s%> <S%G3754>you<s%>, that they <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4238>practise<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G2816>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>, <S%G5544>kindness<s%>, <S%G19>goodness<s%>, <S%G4102>faithfulness<s%>,
meekness <S%G4236><s%>, <S%G1466>self-control<s%>; <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they that <S%G3588>are<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> Jesus have <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3804>passions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the lusts <S%G1939>thereof<s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> let <S%G4748>us<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%>.
Let <S%G1096>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2755>vainglorious<s%>, <S%G4292>provoking<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G5354>envying<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>.
